resources.string: Please input Group Number, student’s BUPT Number, or QM Number to find the group you want. And input “max” to search the highest marks, and “min” for the lowest one.
If students information is imported, the current students information and score data will be cleared. Please save or export information before you click "OK".
If change mark materia, the current score data will be cleared. Please save or export information before you click "OK".
Please import student information and Edit mark criteria first!
